params.taskDescription:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow>
    <mo>{</mo>
    <mtable columnalign="right center left" rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em">
      <mtr>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mn>2</mn>
            <mi>x</mi>
            <mo>+</mo>
            <mi>y</mi>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mo>=</mo>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
            <mn>4</mn>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
      </mtr>
      <mtr>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mn>3</mn>
            <mi>x</mi>
            <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
            <mn>2</mn>
            <mi>y</mi>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mo>=</mo>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
            <mn>6</mn>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
      </mtr>
    </mtable>
    <mo fence="true" stretchy="true" symmetric="true"></mo>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\left\{ \begin{array}{rcl}{2x + y}&{ = }&{ - 4}\\{3x - 2y}&{ = }&{ - 6}\end{array}\right.</annotation></semantics></math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow>
    <mo>{</mo>
    <mtable rowspacing="3pt" columnspacing="1em" displaystyle="true">
      <mtr>
        <mtd>
          <mi>x</mi>
          <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
          <mn>2</mn>
          <mi>y</mi>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mi></mi>
          <mo>=</mo>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
          <mn>5</mn>
        </mtd>
      </mtr>
      <mtr>
        <mtd>
          <mn>2</mn>
          <mi>x</mi>
          <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
          <mn>3</mn>
          <mi>y</mi>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mi></mi>
          <mo>=</mo>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
          <mn>4</mn>
        </mtd>
      </mtr>
    </mtable>
    <mo fence="true" stretchy="true" symmetric="true"></mo>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\left\{ \begin{gathered}   x - 2y &=&  - 5 \hfill \\   2x - 3y &=&  - 4 \hfill \\  \end{gathered}  \right.</annotation></semantics></math>

  <mrow>
    <mo>{</mo>
    <mtable rowspacing="3pt" columnspacing="1em" displaystyle="true">
      <mtr>
        <mtd>
          <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
          <mn>2</mn>
          <mi>x</mi>
          <mo>+</mo>
          <mn>2</mn>
          <mi>y</mi>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mi></mi>
          <mo>=</mo>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mn>6</mn>
        </mtd>
      </mtr>
      <mtr>
        <mtd>
          <mspace width="1em"></mspace>
          <mspace width="1em"></mspace>
          <mspace width="1em"></mspace>
          <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
          <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
          <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
          <mi>y</mi>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mi></mi>
          <mo>=</mo>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
          <mn>3</mn>
          <mi>x</mi>
          <mo>+</mo>
          <mn>1</mn>
        </mtd>
      </mtr>
    </mtable>
    <mo fence="true" stretchy="true" symmetric="true"></mo>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\left\{ \begin{gathered}    - 2x + 2y &=& 6 \hfill \\  \quad\quad\quad\,\,\, y &=&  - 3x + 1 \hfill \\  \end{gathered}  \right.</annotation></semantics></math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow>
    <mo>{</mo>
    <mtable columnalign="right center left" rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em">
      <mtr>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mn>3</mn>
            <mi>x</mi>
            <mo>+</mo>
            <mn>4</mn>
            <mi>y</mi>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mo>=</mo>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mn>1</mn>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
      </mtr>
      <mtr>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mi>y</mi>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mo>=</mo>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
            <mfrac>
              <mn>2</mn>
              <mn>5</mn>
            </mfrac>
            <mi>x</mi>
            <mo>+</mo>
            <mn>2</mn>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
      </mtr>
    </mtable>
    <mo fence="true" stretchy="true" symmetric="true"></mo>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\left\{ \begin{array}{rcl}{3x + 4y}&{ = }&{1}\\{y}&{ = }&{ - \frac{2}{5}x + 2}\end{array}  \right.</annotation></semantics></math>

  <mrow>
    <mo>{</mo>
    <mtable columnalign="right center left" rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em">
      <mtr>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mi>y</mi>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mo>=</mo>

        </mtd>

          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mfrac>
              <mn>7</mn>
              <mn>8</mn>
            </mfrac>
            <mi>x</mi>
            <mo>+</mo>
            <mn>4</mn>
          </mrow>
        </mtd>

      <mtr>
        <mtd>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">

            <mi>y</mi>
          </mrow>

        </mtd>

    <mo fence="true" stretchy="true" symmetric="true"></mo>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\left\{ \begin{array}{rcl}{y}&{ = }&{\frac{7}{8}x + 4}\\{ - 7x + 8y}&{ = }&{6}\end{array}  \right.</annotation></semantics></math>

questionSetStimulus: For the following exercises, solve the systems of equations by substitution.
